Good points. Let me try to answer.

Basically, we need to know where our storylines are going. Also, we 
need to see what we can do to actually have more posts.

I agree that we could use a different forum, but we don't have access 
to a board of our own. If anyone could help us for that, it would be 
great. So, since in game posting slows down a lot during the 
holidays, we thought that it might be a good thing to organize a RPG 
discussion period at that time.

I hope this clears any uncertainties. If you have suggestions, feel 
free to share them!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:

be

chat

> >   o *****
